changes.change:
NEW FEATURES:
•Added Tranzlo shortcut
•Added options for Spongebob text shortcuts (random, alternate, vowels, or consonents)

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Improved entropy of randomness for Spongebob text
•Reorganized some settings
•Code refactoring

If you experiencing any issue or shortcuts not showing correctly, please reset.

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed shortcuts not properly collapsed in normal keyboard

NEW FEATURES:
•Added basic floating keyboard support

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•None

NEW FEATURES:
•Added Loupe shortcut

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•None

NEW FEATURES:
•Added Copypasta shortcut

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•None

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Added support for iOS 14.x
•Removed Alderis as dependency since it's causing crash on iOS 14.x (arm64e)
•NOTE: Remove Alderis if your App Store crash!
•Uses libsparkcolourpicker instead (repo: https://sparkdev.me/)

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed tweak injection failed on Photos.app's markup tool

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Added artificial delay for some multi-action shortcuts since some apps can't handle lighthing fast action (Telegram)
•Some other improvements

NEW FEATURES:
•Added studly caps (SpOnGebOb tExT)

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Performance improvements: caching & multithreading
•Fixed crash

NEW FEATURES:
-Not available

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Boosted over 50% keyboard loading performance for demanding shortcuts
-Remedied shortcuts revert to default settings in the event of failed rocketbootstrap communication
-Fixed "Disabled Shortcuts" not showing cells after a "Reset" when all 45 shortcuts are enabled
-And few other bug fixes

If you experiencing any issue or shortcuts not showing correctly, please reset.

NEW FEATURES:
-Added Delete Forward shortcut

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Moved "Paste and Go" section into "Paste Behaviour" in extras

If you experiencing any issue or shortcuts not showing correctly, please reset.

NEW FEATURES:
-Added Globe & Dictation shortcuts

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed potential crash in Preferences when upgraded from v1
-Fixed gestures not available when switching keyboard input language

If you experiencing any issue or shortcuts not showing correctly, please reset.

NEW FEATURES:
-Not available

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Properly handle error in "Manage Shortcuts" after upgraded from old package

NEW FEATURES:
-Added "Smart Delete"

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed uninstalled third-party tweak still showing up in Preferences

NEW FEATURES:
-15 new shortcuts!
-Added double tap gesture
-Added third-party tweak shortcuts: CopyLog*, Translomatic*, Wasabi* & Pasithea*
-Added Prev. & Next Word shortcuts
-Added Line Start & End shortcuts
-Added Start & End of Paragraph shortcuts
-Added Start & End of Sentence shortcuts
-Added Select Line, Select Paragraph & Select Sentence shortcuts
*Package needs to be installed for shortcut to show.

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed not being able to add shortcuts in "Manage Shortcuts" section when only single shortcut is enabled

NEW FEATURES:
-Not available

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed potential crash in Preferences when scrolling to the very bottom and up

NEW FEATURES:
-Added Insert Text shortcut: Insert your predefined text or current date & time
-Added ability to "Paste and Go" in Safari for Paste shortcut

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Shell Command shortcut can now be customized for custom long press gesture action
-Fixed typo in Preferences

NEW FEATURES:
-Now long press gesture is available for shortcuts in collapsed menu
-Added Cursor Up & Cursor Down shortcuts
-Added Define Word shortcut
-Added Shell Command shortcut

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed Define Word not working properly in Safari's Web View
-Fixed moving cursor dismissed keyboard in Safari's Web View
-Fixed UPPERCASE, lowercase and Capitalize shortcuts not working when text selected manually

NEW FEATURES:
-Added Keyboard Input Type shortcut: Cycle through multiples keyboard input type (num pad, phone pad, email etc.)
-Added Auto-Capitalization shortcut

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed delay in Spotlight search after fresh respring

NEW FEATURES:
-Not available

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed sandboxing issue

NEW FEATURES:
-Added ability to customize long press actions. Got to settings and tap the shortcuts to assign.
-Added ability to customize colour individually

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed potential crash for some devices
-Significant amount of codes rewritten for better performance
-And many more minor bug fixes

NEW FEATURES:
-Added option to show toast as text

NEW FEATURES:
-Added new shortcut: Auto-Correction

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed long pressing Cursor shortcuts sometimes ended up in non-stop cursor moving

NEW FEATURES:
-Now you can enable unlimited shortcuts, and set the maximum visible shortucts. Everything else will automatically collapsed into menu in limited space
-Added reset button for shortcuts

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Repositioned respring button

-Fixed crash in Microsoft apps
-Two new shortcuts: move cursor left/right

-Improved reading of preferences
-Better respring
-Fixed crash on long pressing CopyLog button

-Added CopyLog compatibility
-Future proofing code
Added CopyLog compatibility
Minor fixes
First Release
